definition: Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), American writer, scientist, inventor, politician and diplomat
pinyin: Ben3 jie2 ming2 · Fu4 lan2 ke4 lin2

sentences.english: Beattie's solution to the Franklin mystery took four expeditions and Simonson is not expecting miracles.
sentences.chinese: 比泰決心解開富蘭克林探險隊作過四次探險運動之迷。

sentences.english: Kaylin Huang graduated from Franklin High School in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 黃愷琳今年畢業於糜鹿林的富蘭克林高中。

sentences.english: The "witchcraft" line referred to Franklin's imminent departure.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的“巫術”散去暗指富蘭克林即將離開。

sentences.english: Good morning Franklin Company, may I hlp you?
sentences.chinese: 早晨好，富蘭克林公司。我可以爲你服務嗎？

sentences.english: Name one thing Benjamin Franklin is famous for.
sentences.chinese: 富蘭克林其中一項着名的事蹟。

sentences.english: The story of Franklin's kite is known everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 富蘭克林的風箏故事是遐邇聞名的。
富蘭克林，把鑽子遞給我。

sentences.english: In 1729, Franklin purchased the newspaper, The Pennsylvania Gazette.
sentences.chinese: 1729年，富蘭克林買下了《賓夕法尼亞報》。

sentences.english: Zane He graduated from Franklin High School in Elk Grove.
sentences.chinese: 何展翔今年畢業於糜鹿林的富蘭克林高中。

sentences.english: Franklin wanted the turkey as the country's national bird.
sentences.chinese: 富蘭克林想把火雞作爲美國的國鳥。

sentences.english: The southern end of this rift includes the Franklin Mountains near El Paso.
sentences.chinese: 斷裂帶的南端包含了埃爾帕索附近的富蘭克林山系。

sentences.english: Like other presidents, Franklin Pierce hoped to avoid the issue.
sentences.chinese: 像其他的總統一樣，富蘭克林希望能夠避免這個問題。

sentences.english: In 1729, Franklin purchased the paper, The Pennsylvania Gazztte.
sentences.chinese: 1729年，富蘭克林買下《賓夕法尼亞報》。

sentences.english: Franklin has lots of friends and one best friend named Bear.
sentences.chinese: 富蘭克林最好的小夥伴是值得信賴又忠誠可靠的小熊。

sentences.english: I have had Franklin in my life for about 18 years.
sentences.chinese: 富蘭克林陪伴我已有約18個年頭。

sentences.english: Franklin discovered by flying a kite in the thunderstorm. ( electricity )
sentences.chinese: 富蘭克林通過在雷雨中放鷂子而發現了電。

definition: variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
Jobs (name)/see also 史提夫·賈伯斯|史提夫·贾伯斯[Shi3 ti2 fu1 · Jia3 bo2 si1], Steve Jobs

pinyin: Lun2 dun1 Da4 xue2 Xue2 yuan4

definition: Jobs (name)/see also 史蒂夫·喬布斯|史蒂夫·乔布斯[Shi3 di4 fu1 · Qiao2 bu4 si1], Steve Jobs
